header.intro: マインクラフトで東方MMOを体験する
header.group: コミュニティに参加しよう！

about.title: 私達について
about.subtitle: プロジェクトの簡単な紹介！
about.description: The Project started quite small initially with few people but as time went on project started to get some attraction and goals went bigger. Now we are creating playable version of Entirety of Touhou Universe with combining MMO and Survival Minecraft elements with requiring 0 mods to play on for maximum accessibility for everyone.

items.name: 特注モブ
items.description: We have custom Touhou themed mobs with 0 mods!

items.name: 東方テーマクラーセズ
items.description: Each class has unique gameplay to encourage players to experiment!

items.name: 物語のクエスト
items.description: We have simple yet extensive quest lines with great rewards to players

items.name: Weather Events
items.description: Each day is different in some way with dynamic seasons!

cta.title: コミュニティ
cta.description: Consider joining our ever growing discord server!

items.question: Is there a map download?
items.answer: No, because the map relies on the server's plugins to function.The map also keeps our project alive and we do not want to segment the community! Map is only given to people who knows what they are doing and they are contributing to the project one way or another.

items.question: How can I let you guys know about issues?
items.answer: For quick reports on survival, use ⁠#bug-reports, or if it regards a moderation issue please contact the staff team in ⁠#staff-ticket.

items.question: I can't join the server?
items.answer: The server does not allow cracked accounts access to it, so that may be one reason. Otherwise please open a ticket in #staff-contact with a screenshot of the error-message you are getting, staff will help out as best they can.

items.question: Does this server has chat reporting on?
I'm experiencing some connection issues?
items.answer: Yes, that might be case for wifi and server being generally far. If it's something that everyone experiences please report it to staff.

rules.subtitle: サーバールール
rules.description: Important rules to keep community clean

support.title: Support the project!
support.description: This is a Non-Profit project so every donation helps us out!
